spec_data.Name: rubygem-webrat
spec_data.Description:
Webrat lets you quickly write expressive and robust acceptance tests
for a Ruby web application. It supports simulating a browser inside
a Ruby process to avoid the performance hit and browser dependency of
Selenium or Watir, but the same API can also be used to drive real
Selenium tests when necessary (eg. for testing AJAX interactions).
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 05:36:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Ruby Acceptance Testing for Web applications
